TextFileHandling module¶

TextFileHandling.ParseCut(cut_string)¶

Parses cut read in from a settings file (which can’t have spaces). :param cut_string: string of requirement to be parsed

TextFileHandling.ReadList(filename, isFloat=False)¶

Read values from a file into a list. :param filename: name of file to be read.

class TextFileHandling.Settings(filename, verbose=True)¶

Bases: object

Class for reading inputs from a text file. In the text file the inputs are stored file line- by-line with the format:

KEY : VALUE

The inputs are stored in a dictionary to be accessed. If the line in the text file begins with a ‘*’ character it will not be read (use- ful for comments etc.)

GetF(id)¶

Return the setting as a float. :param id: key in dictionary

GetI(id)¶

Return the setting as an integer. :param id: key in dictionary

GetKeys()¶

Return a list of the keys.

GetS(id)¶

Return the setting as a string. :param id: key in dictionary

ReadSettings()¶

Read the settings from the file into a dictionary.

Lambda_c_BDT
